title: Chapter 8 – Practice: Working with Text – Strings
description: Hands-on missions for chapter 8 using string indexing, slicing, common methods, and f-strings.

solution.notes: Learner should slice parts of first and last name and combine them into a code name using an f-string, then print it in a clear sentence.
Learner should use indexing, slicing, and .lower()/.upper() on a provided message string and print the results.
Learner should use .strip(), .replace(), and .split() on prepared messy strings, then print cleaned results and list items.
Learner should combine several variables into a single readable status line using an f-string and print it.
